fixes.name: Accounts Above Threshold
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR threshold = SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    MAX('accounts+'[CurrentBalance]) >= threshold,
    SELECTEDVALUE('accounts+'[AccountID]),
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to DAX IF. Replaced the parameter [Parameters].[Balance Threshold] with SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As]). Transformed column references to 'accounts+'[CurrentBalance] and 'accounts+'[AccountID]. Used MAX('accounts+'[CurrentBalance]) to evaluate the condition in measure context and SELECTEDVALUE('accounts+'[AccountID]) to return a single AccountID when the condition is met.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
